name: Guns vs Zombies
description:
The corona virus has caused a zombie apocalypse! You are the only survivor in your neighborhood and you must survive! You are pushed back to just your backyard but it will do. Guns are your friend. The virus is to be cured in a week so you must survive the next 7 days! Good Luck!

How To Play

W-A-S-D - Move

LMB - Shoot your SMGs and Rifles

RMB - Shoot your shotguns
